snippet.title: Amber Heard and Evan Rachel Wood friends.. What does this mean for Marilyn Manson accusations?
snippet.description:
Hi friends! So today we are going to talk about all of the updated information and theories that have been floating all over the internet about the Marilyn Manson accusations. 

Trent Reznor, Wes Borlans and Dita Von Teese spoke out about the situation. Amber Heard and Evan Rachel Wood are close friends, Johnny Depp and Marilyn Manson are close friends. Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's defamation trial is set to start soon. What does this all mean? Well there is a lot of theories all over the internet and we are going to analyze them all!

Recommended videos - 

My Weekend With Marilyn Manson - https://youtu.be/wbvEGU-S4B0

My Analysis of Marilyn Manson abuse allegations part 2 - https://youtu.be/dQJt3DTrhIE

Let me know what you guys all think. I am in no way shape or form saying that these women are lying. I completely agree with the metoo movement and I stand in support of all survivors. I just do not want the metoo movement to get to the point where people are looked at as bad if they question something. I dont want people to be shamed into thinking a certain way. If you want all information before you make your own decision, then that does not make you a bad person.
